SELECT a.date, COUNT(a.date) AS count FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(s.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS date FROM saying s) a GROUP BY a.date ORDER BY a.date
mapper.sql:
SELECT s.id FROM saying s LEFT JOIN rel_saying_tag rst ON s.id = rst.saying_id LEFT JOIN sys_tag st ON st.id = rst.tag_id
st.id in
#{item}
and s.author like concat('%', #{author}, '%')
and s.book like concat('%', #{book}, '%')
and s.article like concat('%', #{article}, '%')
GROUP BY s.id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT st.id) = #{tagSize} ORDER BY s.id desc
mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.name, s.author, s.book, s.article, s.create_date, s.modifier_date, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT st.id ORDER BY st.id SEPARATOR ',') AS tagIds, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT st.name ORDER BY st.name SEPARATOR ',') AS tagNames FROM saying s LEFT JOIN rel_saying_tag rst ON s.id = rst.saying_id LEFT JOIN sys_tag st ON st.id = rst.tag_id WHERE s.id = #{id} GROUP BY s.id
